meanings.definition: Designed to prevent slipping or sliding.
meanings.sent1: The nonslip shoes helped me walk safely on the wet floor.
meanings.sent2: The nonslip mat kept the rug in place on the slippery tiles.
meanings.sent3: The nonslip gloves made it impossible for me to juggle slippery fish.
meanings.sent4: Her nonslip grip on reality kept her grounded in difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The nonslip surface of the ramp ensured the wheelchair user's safety.

meanings.definition: A surface or material that prevents slipping.
meanings.sent1: The nonslip on the stairs prevented accidents in the house.
meanings.sent2: The nonslip of the pool deck made it safe for kids to play.
meanings.sent3: The nonslip of the banana peel in the cartoon was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a nonslip, guiding him through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The nonslip of the hiking trail made the trek enjoyable for all.
